SEARCH
Package com.project.src

Class Main

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
com.project.src.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class Main extends processing.core.PApplet
Main application class for tracking expenses. Extends PApplet to use the Processing framework for graphical user interface and rendering. This class initializes the application window, manages the main application logic, and handles user interactions such as form submissions and filtering expenses.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Angelo Ripamonti invalid input: '&' Luca Avveduto

  • Method Details

    • settings

      public void settings()
      Configures the size of the application window.
      Overrides:
      settings in class processing.core.PApplet

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Initializes the application by setting the window title, creating a new Model instance, and populating the list of expenses. This method also sets up sample expenses and initializes the list to be displayed.
      Overrides:
      setup in class processing.core.PApplet

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Main draw loop for rendering graphics. This method updates the display based on the current screen state and renders the list of expenses.
      Overrides:
      draw in class processing.core.PApplet

    • login

      public void login()
      Handles the login form submission. This method calls the login function from the FormView class and switches the screen state to show the main expense list.

    • register

      public void register()
      Handles the register form submission. This method calls the register function from the FormView class and switches the screen state to show the main expense list.

    • home

      public void home()

    • select

      public void select(controlP5.ControlEvent theEvent)
      Handles selection events from the dropdown list. This method updates the list of expenses to display based on the selected category from the dropdown list.
      Parameters:
      theEvent - the ControlEvent containing the select data

    • graphic

      public void graphic()
      Switches the screen to display the graphic interface. This method hides various UI elements and sets the screen state to show the graphical representation of expenses.

    • add

      public void add(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles the event when the add expense button is pressed. This method hides the add button, locks filters, shows the add expense menu, and triggers the add expense callback.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the event data

    • range

      public void range(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles the event when a range selection is made in the graphic interface. This method calls the select callback for the graphic page.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the event data

    • account

      public void account(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles the event when the account settings button is pressed. This method hides various UI elements and sets the screen state to show the account settings.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the event data

    • category

      public void category(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles the event when a category is selected in the add expense menu. This method calls the category callback for the add expense menu.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the event data

    • exit

      public void exit(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles the event when the exit button is pressed in the add expense menu. This method hides the add expense menu and resets the screen state to show the main expense list.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the event data

    • done

      public void done(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles the event when the done button is pressed in the add expense menu. This method triggers the done callback for the add expense menu, updates the list of expenses, and resets the screen state to show the main expense list.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the event data

    • reorder

      public void reorder(controlP5.ControlEvent event)
      Handles selection events from the dropdown list. This method reorder the list of expenses to display based on the order from the dropdown list.
      Parameters:
      event - the ControlEvent containing the selection data

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount()
      Handles account deletion. This method deletes the user account and resets the screen state to show the login form.

    • deleteList

      public void deleteList()
      Handles deletion of the expense list. This method deletes all expenses associated with the current account.

    • accountShowPassword

      public void accountShowPassword()
      Toggles the visibility of the account password. This method shows or hides the account password in the user interface.

    • backExpenses

      public void backExpenses()
      Switches the screen to display the list of expenses. This method hides account management fields and shows the expense list.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Handles the user logout process. This method hides account management fields, resets the screen state to show the login form, and sets the current account to null.

    • exportData

      public void exportData()
      Exports the current account data to a JSON file. This method calls the "AccountPage.exportData()" method to create a directory if it does not exist and writes the account data to a JSON file. It handles any potential errors during the directory creation or file writing process and updates the user interface with appropriate success or failure messages.

    • mouseWheel

      public void mouseWheel(processing.event.MouseEvent event)
      Handles mouse wheel events to scroll through the list of expenses. This method is called whenever the user scrolls the mouse wheel. It updates the scrolling position of the expense list based on the scroll direction and speed.
      Overrides:
      mouseWheel in class processing.core.PApplet
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent instance containing the scroll data

    • main

      public static void main(String[] passedArgs)
      The main method to launch the application.
      Parameters:
      passedArgs - command-line arguments
